meaning: char, hurry, impatient, irritate, burn, scorch, singe

onyomiExamples.meaning: being in focus (in photography), bringing into focus
middle jiao (in traditional Chinese medicine), middle burner

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to burn, to scorch, to char, to singe
to burn, to scorch, to singe, to char
to yearn for, to be in love with
to be in a hurry, to be impatient, to be anxious (to do), to fret, to get a fright, to panic, to get flustered, to be startled
to get impatient, to become irritated, to fret, to chafe
to tease, to irritate, to tantalize, to keep (someone) in suspense
